Changes.LogName: Abigail Yellow Mayo Letter for CT

Entries.Abigail_yellowmayo: The prank went off without a hitch. Seb and Sam didn't notice until it was too late!$h
I'm not thrilled Abigail has discovered duck mayonnaise.$5
Abigail ruined Seb and I's day with duck mayonnaise.$2#$b#YOU were the one who gave it to her?!$8
